H0.text: The Appian Way ran from Rome to which Italian port. Ostia

H1.text: The Appian Way ran from Rome to which Italian port. Puteoli

H2.text: The Appian Way ran from Rome to which Italian port. Naples

H3.text: The Appian Way ran from Rome to which Italian port. Brindisi

A4.text: It connected Rome to Brindisi, in southeast Italy.
